Female artists often created large painted sheets of hiapo (tapa), like the one shown from Niue, within which of the following traditional contexts?

choices.label: private worship of family deities on a home altar
providing permanent decoration for a new royal palace
preparation for warfare and military conquest
observation of important public ceremonies and rituals

content.answer: observation of important public ceremonies and rituals

topic.text: 9.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Pacific Art
